Kim Nayeon

Group (2014-2021):

Introduction

Kim Nayeon is a South Korean singer currently signed to Studio25. She is best known for her time as a member of the girl group Berry Good and as a contestant on the survival show Idol School. Nayeon made her solo debut with the single "Merry Solo Christmas" on December 13, 2021.
